title: Google\Cloud\DataLabeling\V1beta1\SentimentConfig
name: SentimentConfig
description:
Config for setting up sentiments.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.SentimentConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_label_sentiment_selection
params.description: If set to true, contributors will have the option to select sentiment of the label they selected, to mark it as negative or positive label. Default is false.
